entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
